snippet.textDisplay: The first six notes are the exact same as the leitmotiv of the soundtrack "Breakdown" from Diamond Is Unbreakable. Funny how Castlevania and JoJo have been referencing each other for decades now.
snippet.textOriginal: The first six notes are the exact same as the leitmotiv of the soundtrack "Breakdown" from Diamond Is Unbreakable. Funny how Castlevania and JoJo have been referencing each other for decades now.

snippet.textDisplay: This song comes early on in the when the player is growing in power fast, and the enemies aren't too hard.  Combine these elements with the style of the music, and the vibe I felt was that I was strutting around the castle like I owned the place.  Very fitting, and very awesome.
snippet.textOriginal: This song comes early on in the when the player is growing in power fast, and the enemies aren't too hard.  Combine these elements with the style of the music, and the vibe I felt was that I was strutting around the castle like I owned the place.  Very fitting, and very awesome.

snippet.textDisplay: this game easily has one of my favorite OSTs of all time... every song from it just feels like a lot of work went into it, and as a result it just sounds like one of the more inspired castlevania soundtracks from the metroidvania era
snippet.textOriginal: this game easily has one of my favorite OSTs of all time... every song from it just feels like a lot of work went into it, and as a result it just sounds like one of the more inspired castlevania soundtracks from the metroidvania era

snippet.textDisplay:
=)
man, cant believe i wrote that 3 years ago, time flies.
Yeah, sometimes we (net users) say stuff we dont truly mean to say on here.. happening on the spur of the moment.. not really realizing what hurtful things we type. 

I'm sure many negative comments out there are from your normal everyday people- to not categorize them negatively.
Some do it for trolling, others to vent off, some to jest around.

snippet.textDisplay:
yeah... u know, i apologize. I was quite harsh in my response...sorry that was a stupid thing of me tos say. Not everyone has played everything, even though it may be a very popular title and all...
 it's just that i've been playing Castevania since i was 11-12 and it baffled me that someone else didnt ever try the games out... 

yeah to answer ur questions, I think you should start castlevania games from the basic, easy ones, and work ur way up =)
snippet.textOriginal:
yeah... u know, i apologize. I was quite harsh in my response...sorry that was a stupid thing of me tos say. Not everyone has played everything, even though it may be a very popular title and all...
 it's just that i've been playing Castevania since i was 11-12 and it baffled me that someone else didnt ever try the games out... 

yeah to answer ur questions, I think you should start castlevania games from the basic, easy ones, and work ur way up =)

snippet.textDisplay: Oh I'm sorry. Did my question offend you in some way? Or have I just not lived up to your gaming standards? Because I'm sure theres got to be a classic game/game franchise that you haven't played that I like, but I wouldn't get all stroppy about it. I was just inquiring as to where I should start. Thanks to the other guys for the replies.
